Introduction

TRI.BE, formerly known as LIONGIRLS and TRI.ANGLE, is a 6 member girl group under TR Entertainment, formerly under Lionheart Entertainment. They were co-produced by the late Shinsadong Tiger and Universal Music. They debuted in February 2021 with the single album TRI.BE Da Loca.

The group’s name is a combination of “TRI”, an abbreviation for “triangle”, which is a symbol of perfection, and “BE”, which means existence, which has the meaning of ‘perfect existence’.

On July 22, 2023, TR Entertainment confirmed that Jinha would be leaving the group due to personal reasons. TRI.BE would continue to promote as a six-member group.

On March 13, 2025, it was reportedly announced that TRI.BE's company TR Entertainment, has been declared bankrupt. After Shinsadong Tiger's passing, investment had stopped resulting in financial problems and ultimately going bankrupt. After this, nothing has been revealed about whether or not TRI.BE will continue promoting as a group.
